name: bootstrapfour
description: A Bootstrap v4 theme for the Hugo static site generator.

scripts.build:css: node-sass --output-style expanded --precision 6 source/scss/style.scss static/css/style.css.tmp && cleancss --level 1 static/css/style.css.tmp -o static/css/style.css.tmp2 && cssgzmin static/css/style.css.tmp2 static/css/style.css &&  rm static/css/style.css.gz && gzip -k static/css/style.css
scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run clean

author: Steve Hume
